mapper.sql: SALES_ORDER_ID as salesOrder, PLATFORM_MEMBER_CODE as platformMemberCode, REAL_NAME as realName, EMAIL as email, MOBILE as mobile, PHONE as phone, COUNTRY as country, PROVINCE as province, CITY as city, DISTRICT as district, ADDRESS as address, SHOP_ID as shopId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_td_order_member ( SALES_ORDER_ID, PLATFORM_MEMBER_CODE , REAL_NAME , EMAIL , MOBILE , PHONE , COUNTRY , PROVINCE , CITY , DISTRICT , ADDRESS , SHOP_ID ) VALUES ( #{salesOrder,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{platformMemberCode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{realName,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{email,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mobile,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{phone,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{country,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{province,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{city,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{district,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{address,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
